programme.desc: Conversation, advice and great company to make your morning.

programme.title: Crimewatch UK S17 (15/15)
programme.desc: How a man sent to prison for GBH was retried and sent to prison a second time for murder.

programme.title: Critical Incident S3 (15/15)
programme.desc: It's a busy night shift for the Avon and Somerset police in Bristol.

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer S24 (72/80)
programme.desc: Featuring properties in Hull, Derby and Gillingham.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Christina Trevanionheads to Leominster in Herefordshire for today's Bargain Hunt. With the expert help of Kate Bliss and Ochucko Ojiri, the red and blue teams battle it out in the Secondhand Warehouse and Antiques Centre to see who can buy the most profitable three items to take to auction. Christina also learns about tribal art as she looks at boomerangs, beaded bags and African masks.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest national and international news from the BBC.

programme.title: Hope Street S2 (2/10)
programme.desc: As Finn investigates a shooting, Marlene profoundly upsets her stepdad Barry.

programme.title: The Repair Shop S2
programme.desc: Jay Blades and the team bring three treasured family heirlooms, and the memories they hold, back to life. Resident clock restorer Steve Fletcher restores a German-made toy steam roller from the 1930's. After not being used for around 40 years, it needs a full check-up to get it up and running again. Stained glass expert Matthew Nickels pieces together a damaged glass picture window depicting a colourful boat at sea. Made by the owner's late father, it has a great deal of sentimental value and so she is ecstatic when Matthew manages to make it all ship-shape and just like new again. Meanwhile, leather expert Suzie turns her attention to three iconic leather sling back Les Arcs chairs desperately in need of some love and attention to make them usable again.

programme.title: Escape to the Country S19 (45/70)
programme.desc: Margherita Taylor goes house-hunting in Shropshire.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip S24 (20/25)
programme.desc: Phil dallies with scarecrows while Irita gallops ahead. Who will cross the line first?

programme.title: Bridge of Lies S1
programme.desc: Ross Kemp presents as a team of four family members - Elisha, Emma, Georgia and Paul - take on the Bridge of Lies. One by one they all face the bridge, choosing who faces each crossing depending on the question category. Each bridge crossing has 32 potential steps - 22 truths and 10 lies - and they must cross by stepping on the truths and avoiding the lies, earning money for each correct answer. Once they have each faced the bridge on their own, those who have been successful will join forces to face the final crossing for a chance to take home the cash.

programme.title: Pointless S26
programme.desc: The quiz in which contestants try to score as few points as possible by plumbing the depths of their general knowledge to come up with the answers no-one else could think of. Presented by Alexander Armstrong and co-host Richard Osman.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest national and international news stories from the BBC News team, followed by weather.

programme.title: The One Show
programme.desc: Alex Jones and Jermaine Jenas bring you the stories that matter from across the country.

programme.title: A Question of Sport S52
programme.desc: Host Paddy McGuinness and team captains Sam Quek and Ugo Monye are joined by Ashes-winning cricketer Steve Harmison, England defender Stephen Warnock, Winter Olympian Aimee Fuller and Rugby World Cup winner Maggie Alphonsi.

programme.title: Beyond Paradise S1 (4/6)
programme.desc: A mystery man is found dead in the centre of a crop circle, but are aliens responsible?

programme.title: Would I Lie to You? S16
programme.desc: Rob Brydon and captains Lee Mack and David Mitchell are joined by Stephen Bailey, Asim Chaudhry, Gemma Collins and Sally Lindsay. The guests reveal extraordinary stories about themselves, but are they telling the truth or making it all up?

programme.title: The Cleaner (The Transaction) S2 (1/6)
programme.desc: «The Transaction»Wicky has to clean up after a lethal brawl in a pub, and he's meant to be off the booze.
